subject: Re: [junit] Possible bug with @Ignore @BeforeClass?
msgSnippet: Mike, @Ignore predates me, but I think I ve got my head around it. Let me turn the question around: what would be the difference between a method marked
messageBody:
Mike,

@Ignore predates me, but I think I've got my head around it.

Let me turn the question around: what would be the difference between
a method marked @BeforeClass @Ignore, and one with no annotations?

David Saff

On 2/19/07, Mike Morris <mikro2nd@...> wrote:
> ...or am I not understanding something?
>
> Tried @Ignoring an @BeforeClass method, but it doesn't get ignored.
> Bug in the runner or in my understanding?
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
